title: The Title Clearance has been certified by Advocate/Solicitor who has experience in this field of a m
clause_text: The Title Clearance has been certified by Advocate/Solicitor who has experience in this field of a minimum 10 years Any other conditions as may deem fit and proper in the interest of general public.
section: No. Ch.E. /DP/ of FINAL POSSESSION RECEIPT
